content.query:
--Count the number of athletes from each country
SELECT Country, COUNT(*) as TotalAthletes
FROM athletes
GROUP BY Country
ORDER BY TotalAthletes ASC;

--Calculate the total medals won by each country

SELECT Team_Country, SUM(Gold) AS Gold_Win, SUM(Silver) AS Silver_Win, SUM(Bronze) AS Bronze_Win
FROM Medals
GROUP BY Team_Country;
